section.p: Identifies contiguous growth (extension) of the primary tumor within the organ of origin or its direct extension into neighboring organs. Possible values are Not applicable; Further contiguous extension; No evidence of primary tumor; Unknown extension; primary tumor cannot be assessed; not stated in patient record; etc.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] csExtension with data type Code
Identifies contiguous growth (extension) of the primary tumor within the organ of origin or its direct extension into neighboring organs. Possible values are Not applicable; Further contiguous extension; No evidence of primary tumor; Unknown extension; primary tumor cannot be assessed; not stated in patient record; etc.
